special_text:
Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can’t attack The Dutiful Wanderer.
Each opponent who attacked The Dutiful Wanderer this turn can’t cast spells.
[+1]: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with exalted.
[-3]: Exile up to one target creature you control and up to one target creature you don’t control, then return the creature you controlled to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
